translations: 蝰蛇（欧洲产的小毒蛇）；加算器；猪鼻蛇（北美产无毒的）

sentences.sentence: Vipers (adders) and rattlesnakes manufacture the blood poison.
sentences.translation: 蝰蛇(蝮蛇)和响尾蛇产生血液毒素。

sentences.sentence: I loved their sign: "Adders very active at this time of year, keep to the paths".
sentences.translation: 我喜欢他们的告示：“每年这个时候是蝰蛇异常活跃的时期，请勿偏离小路行走。”

sentences.sentence: Twice puff-adders came twisting into the alert ring of our debating coffee-circle.
sentences.translation: 鼓腹毒蛇曾经两次窜进我们的喝咖啡和进行讨论的警戒圈内。
